header.value: video games; gym; reading; hiking; driving

request.description:
2) Create another iflow, which retrieves multiple business partners
2.1) We must retrieve BP that have been created during 2020 or later
We need to fetch the first 30 entries, not every single entry
Select all available fields on level 0
2.2) Convert the output body into JSON. Also use the appropriate header to define that we are using this output.

Request using externalized parameters

i-flow: consolut_learn_testing_iflow_drp

εισοδος- αρχειο σε json
-μετατροπη σε xml
-Post -για δημιουργια παραγγελιας

DAY 4-TASK2B (NIKOLETA'S)
-Json input
-check bp if is soldtoparty
-check given requestedquantities
-based on them , create sales order
-or send email
βαζουμε 1 script για να δημιουργησουμε attachments. Με αυτο τον τροπο εχουμε περισσοτερες πληροφοριες για το iflow χωρις να χρειαζεται συνεχεια να κανουμε το trace : ON

•	Add, edit or delete the received material from the datastore entry. 
o	Control which action should be performed by a header.
o	If the material exists already, edit the existing entry.
An iFlow that calls another iFlow
Task 1 about finding a BP that has inserted in the header of the body , searching for it and appear all the data
